title: "A mobile app and AI software to speed up skin-cancer diagnoses"
excerpt: "When skin cancer is detected early, there is a good chance of recovery. Fraunhofer researchers have developed a digital solution to significantly speed-up diagnosis. A mobile application assists in recording skin lesions and sends these to dermatology departments in hospitals."
